attributes.action: Give Nigel Farage a knighthood for his service to British politics
attributes.background: Nigel Farage has personally changed the face of politics and democracy in this country and whether you like him or not deserves to be recognised for it.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
